text: Hagi e'i ana vene'neramina ese ikante'ma Jodani timo'ma tima hageno enevuno mikazama ante hananeno'ma enevigeno takamahe'nea vahetamine. Hagi ana vene'neramimo'za Jodani tina takahe'za kantu kaziga agupofima mani'naza vahetmina ome zamahe'nati'za zage hanati kazigane zage fre kaziga ome zamatre eme zamatre hu'naza vahe mani'naze.
